thread.title: william r williams
thread.title_full: SixityAuto.com reviewed by william r williams

author: william r williams
title: william r williams
text: Slow website response caused me to order twice because I thought the first attempt failed. Waited over two minutes for the screen to refresh. On the second attempt, it refreshed within 15 seconds...still very slow compared to most online transactions.
